name: No Glitched Ad Sign
description: A recent tumblr update made some styles to get rid of ads break slightly, and now displays a glitchy looking icon with no text. This style gets rid of that.
additional_info:
Not tested, if you find that it gets rid of anything else then please tell me at shiiptowreck.tumblr.com!

(Only 3 lines of code so should not be glitchy or do anything wrong.)
